title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-6.4 - Issuance of certificate of inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-6.4 - Issuance of certificate of inspection

State Regulations

No official emissions inspection station or certified
inspector may issue an emission certificate of inspection, as defined by 15
NYCRR section
79.1, for a motor vehicle unless
the motor vehicle of record has been inspected pursuant to, and meets the
requirements of section
217-6.3
of this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
217-6.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
